definition: saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: The cost of seeds per mu could save 500 yuan and the total cost be half.
sentences.chinese: 每畝可節約種子費500多元，工本費可節省一半。
這種分類方式能幫助人們節省在圖書館找資料的時間。

sentences.english: Santiago drank sparingly from his water bottle during the hot afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在熾熱的下午，桑提亞哥節省地喝起水壺裏的水。

sentences.english: Do yuo want to help your family save cash when times are tight ?
sentences.chinese: 既然經濟不景氣，想幫家裏節省開支嗎？

sentences.english: These savings could lower the cost of stock orders.
sentences.chinese: 節省下來的錢可以降低股票交易的成本。

sentences.english: To that end, Beijing Hyundai is fitting the new Elantra with fuel-saving silica tires.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到這點，現代公司將爲悅動裝配節省燃油的矽胎。

sentences.english: Listing 2. A smaller trim threshold might save space.
sentences.chinese: 一個更小的內存消減閾值可能節省內存空間。

sentences.english: If every one of us saves water at home, then the water saved together would be a huge amout.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可以節省的每一個人，從水是重要的。

sentences.english: Low-flow toilets can save a lot of water.
sentences.chinese: 節水廁所可以節省很多水。

sentences.english: If you commit your finances to God it will probably mean cutting back on your spending.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想讓上帝保佑你財運亨通，那你就得節省開支。

sentences.english: This translates into  potentially thousands of dollars that you saved the employer.
sentences.chinese: 這就會轉化爲你潛在的爲老闆節省了上千美元。

sentences.english: Most fruit is sent overseas by airfreight in order to save time.
sentences.chinese: 大部分運送到海外的水果都是用空運以節省時間。

sentences.english: The higher energy use that results tends to outstrip the original efficiency gains.
sentences.chinese: 能源使用的增加量超過了最初節省的量。

sentences.english: After Thanatos is dead, the team can move on to blow immortals in order to save ammo.
sentences.chinese: 大藍死後，隊伍可以繼續炸綠殭屍以節省彈藥。

sentences.english: One type of design, save the size, easy to install.
sentences.chinese: 一體式的設計，節省體積，方便安裝。

sentences.english: Making use of the geometric relations, the location of the rays is accurate and timesaving.
sentences.chinese: 利用幾何特性尋找射線，既準確又節省計算時間。

definition: expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
